name: Watermelon Paleta Shot
description: This watermelon paleta shot is a combination of sweet watermelon, lime juice, tequila, and chile powder. So good it makes my mouth water!
recipeIngredient: ½ cup Sugar or sweetener of your choice

recipeInstructions.text: Place the watermelon, tequila, lime juice, and sugar in the blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the watermelon, tequila, lime juice, and sugar in the blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 tsp. of chile powder at the bottom of each popsicle mold.
recipeInstructions.name: Place 1 tsp. of chile powder at the bottom of each popsicle mold.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in watermelon mixture into molds, snap on lids, insert popsicle sticks, and freeze overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in watermelon mixture into molds, snap on lids, insert popsicle sticks, and freeze overnight.

keywords: paleta shot, watermelon paleta, watermelon popsicle
